EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform is a Wrap, Read the Recaps!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
August 5, 2016 <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/final-call-parting-shots-from-springone-platform]]> SpringOne Platform is a Wrap! SpringOne Platform was a great success, from the keynotes and sessions, to the food and games. Read these recaps to see what everyone is talking about. Read Now <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/final-call-parting-shots-from-springone-platform]]> <[[http://www.businessinsider.com/pivotal-rob-mee-paul-maritz-springone-2016-7]]> From Working with Google to Home Depot, This is the Story of Pivotal CEO Rob Mee Business Insider details the story of Pivotal and CEO Rob Mee, from where we began, to the types of customers we work with today. Check it out <[[http://www.businessinsider.com/pivotal-rob-mee-paul-maritz-springone-2016-7]]> <[[https://youtu.be/WDvCIhfb6y4]]> Citi's Transformational Journey Brad Miller, Head of Global Digital Technology, Consumer Digital & Cloud Technology at Citi, speaks about how the 200-year old banking institution is transforming its technology and culture. Watch Now <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WDvCIhfb6y4]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/features/positive-sum-software-springs-new-bounce-springone-platform-day-3]]> Positive Sum Software and Spring’s New Bounce Day 3 kicked off with Sam Ramji, who oversees the gestalt that is the open source Cloud Foundry Foundation—where software choice and freedom are safe, and where inclusion, participation, and accountability keep it that way. Read More <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/features/positive-sum-software-springs-new-bounce-springone-platform-day-3]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DGK6jjamzfY]]> Simplifying the Future Adrian Cockcroft closed out SpringOne Platform with an incredible talk featuring a lot of wise takeaways. This is a must-watch for anyone who works in software.
